name: Card City Conqueror
description:
Card  City Conqueror is a student project from a solo programmer, in which I had to challenge myself to expand my skillset, developing unique features to add to my portfolio.

My primary focuses were:

  • Shaders (Shaderlab in URP)
  • Card Inventory and Combat
  • Third Person Exploration

The smartest choice would have been to create a simple prototype showcase; however I turned down that thought and decided to make a game - because they are entertaining. Due to this choice, a fair amount of time was dedicated to refining several design aspects such as the user interface, level environment, and the narrative.

As a result of limited time and resources, many features were not included in order to polish existing mechanics. Regardless, I hope you have fun playing Card  City Conqueror, because after all, that is the purpose of a game.
